main event: A UFO sighting occurred in Buchanan, Virginia, on January 18, 1965, reported by multiple witnesses.
interesting points: The object was described as round with three stacked rings resembling donuts., The UFO was traveling in an easterly direction at high speed and altitude., Witnesses reported a bright white light on top and colored lights between the rings., The sighting lasted approximately 2 to 5 minutes., None of the witnesses appeared to attempt to exaggerate their observations.
sighted object: a round object with three stacked rings and colored lights
witness description: Children and students from Buchanan, Virginia
